Dialogue.Value: Post your top-secret battle tips!,UNDERNET ONLY!
Here’s a PA from me to get you,started!
TailWind，HeadWind，ColdAir.,Thank me later.
HAHAHA!,Everyone already knows such,a basic PA.
You want a good PA?,VenomShot，PoisonStage，,BioSpray.
Truly the finest of PAs.
Is this a PA thread?
ChainGun，ChargeCannon，,ShotGun.
My Navi shreds enemies with,this every day.
Get out if you’re just going to,make stuff up.
Do you not know that PAs use,version 2 chips?
Mostly.,Some V2 don’t work，but I don’t,know if the PA works at all.
Is the V2 rumor a hoax?,Someone needs to verify.
Oops，PA tax.,Barrier，Power Aura，,AuraSword 2
No PA for you，but I’ve,heard an interesting rumor.
There are PAs involving,Dark Chips....
Dark Chips alone do 400,damage，would a Dark PA,break 1000?
>Dark PA,Cool if true.
I saw a friend use a PA with,Ground Wave，DigDrill，and,something else.
I don’t think the last one was a,normal chip.
Dark PAs are real，and they’re,perfect for the Undernet.
Saw one with DanmaGun，,FlareGun，and Electric Fang.
One of them was a Dark Chip.
>Relying on PAs to do damage,Real skill is chaining combos,and multipliers to win.
Elec element doubles on ice,panels and doubles on Slip,status....
....that’s times 4 damage for,an Elec chip. Interesting!
I tried using Melt to double,Aqua damage on a Heat Navi，,but they wouldn’t Melt.
Melt a Earth element.
They’re already weak to it，so,Aqua will do 4 times damage.
If you can Slip a Poison Navi,while they’re on Ice or Poison....
8!!,My RailGun3 would do 1600,damage!
This bad guy has a one-hit KO,dream!
I found the ghost of a ROM Navi,and found a PA with their chip.
Ice Sword，Ice Stage，and,their chip (V2) gets you the PA.
Ghost Navi? Are you mad?,Use a trader to get Navi chips!
Silver Knife，Time Stop， and,some maid’s chip is a good,finisher.
Another Navi tip here from,trader anon.
Stick two cannons on the,tank-like Navi to get a PA.
Try a White Lily and a,poisonous tornado together,with a poison Navi.
That’s your PA，but don’t think,I’ll spoonfeed you the Navi’s,name.
Enough about PAs!,All you low-IQ battlers chasing,your big shiny super move....
I bet all you’re good at is hiding,while you wait for the exact,right chips to come in.
>seething,What’s the problem?,Don’t know your alphabet?
The troll has a point though.,The point of PA is to build a,folder around it.
If you can’t combo with just the,parts of the PA， you’re doing,something wrong.
I swear I’m not the troll，but I,just can’t find any of those PA,chips!
I’ve made so many trips from,the store to the chip trader that,the clerk recognizes my face!
Buy，buy，buy....,You are everything that’s wrong,with NetBattling today.
Why don’t you buy yourself an,OpenPort and try earning some,of those chips?
>buybrain btfo,I have all the chips I need，so,I run Firewall for convenience.
But just the other day I got hit,by a virus anyways! I’m gonna,go pay that vendor a visit!
Are you sure you’re using it,correctly? Firewall is a great,product and 100% reliable!
Proof or it didn’t happen. I’m,using Firewall right now and it’s,100% reliable!
Really? At least mix up your,scripts if you made it all the way,here，you corporate bots.
What Firewall actually does is,expose your max HP，which,scares off most weak viruses.
But if a virus thinks they’re tough,enough to take you at your,best，you’re out of luck.
>expose your max HP,If you think that’s all it exposes，,I’ve got news for you.
ID，metadata，favorite food....,You can’t trust companies,these days.
All y’all’re whining cowards.,I mix Firewall and OpenPort to,blast my data area-wide!
Navi got beef with me?,Tough virus wanna scrap?,Fight me!
Ok， tough guy.
